## Pipeline.(constructor)

Constructs a new Pipeline instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(pipes: Pipe<any, any>[], options?: PipelineOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pipes | [Pipe](./pipeline.pipe.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, any&gt;\[\] | An array of pipes to be executed by the pipeline. |
|  options | [PipelineOptions](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional settings for the pipeline's behavior. |
